JobShortDescription: We zoeken een backend developer die zowel het team kan aansturen als de API kan door ontwikkelen
JobDescription:
We are looking for a tactical backend developer  who will solve business problems by aligning with product owners and translating the business demand towards the development team
You will manage the projects by drafting API specifications together with the team, setting up new requirements for existing applications, checking the quality and developing yourself

You are a senior, review code and delegate to enable others to deliver and set them up for success
You are representing the company towards third parties (suppliers and Government) and you will lead these meetings
You inspire and coach teams and developers using you interpersonal and soft-skills
JobCriteria:
You have experience with Java/Kotlin/Spring boot
API design and development 
• Preferably have some knowledge or expertise in AWS, docker & k8s, mobile frontend development
Je spreekt bijvoorkeur Nederlands

**Nice to have

**
Javascript experience
JobSalaryBenefits:
For a senior

a little bit less than € 6000,- max
Wanna know more? Email: jacqui@thehouseofappril
com

JobCompany.JobCompanyProfile: This company has 10+ native apps in the store, the team is international. We hear a lot about app teams in NL, about the companies and the atmosphere. About this team, we've heard good things. Nice challenges and apps.
JobCompany.JobCompanyCulture: Hi there! We are The House of Appril, the only Dutch talent agency specialised in app professionals that helps you with great app development jobs in The Netherlands. We are Firmly rooted in the community and as organiser of the Appril Festival, something we have been doing since 2012!   We  support  the Dutch app community and we have a  large network of interesting companies. We provide you with plenty of guidance: online and offline, we support you with your resume, interview advice and our network. The House of Appril's unique approach helps you find your next job or gig.

JobShortDescription:
As a senior android you develop and create apps that are linked to large backend systems of our customers
It's your job to make the app work well in collaboration with the backend
Would be great if you would join our team in the month of February / March
JobDescription:
As an experienced mobile application developer you like to focus on creating, realizing and maintaining mobile applications
These apps that are linked to large backend systems of our customers
It's your job to make the app work well in collaboration with the backend
You have a professional and open mentality
You're a developer who completes his work and likes to explore and develop new capabilities!
Speak dutch and live in NL

We can't tell you everything we want to tell you about this position in this vacancy text
Are you curious and do you know more about what we build and who we are, please contact jacqueline from The House of Appril


he agencies we work with are looking for app builders who are in the possesion of a Dutch work permit ánd reside in The Netherlands
Unfortunately, our clients do not work with people on a remote basis
JobCriteria:
You are experience with Java for at least 5 years

Your main focus would be on the Android platform


**No secrets for you:**
-Android SDK
-Android Studio
- Kotlin
- Eclipse
- LAMP / LNMP (Linux, Apache/Nginx, MySQL, PHP)
- Implementing XML / JSON RESTful interfaces

- ​​​​​​​Speak dutch and live in NL

**Nice to have**
- Experience with iOS 
- Objective C  and Swift
- HTML/ HTML5
- CSS2 / CSS3 and SOAP


Being fluent in Dutch is an advantage but certainly not a requirement


**Listen HERE to our 6 minutes podcast, with all the tech specifications on Spotify
**
JobSalaryBenefits:
- a good salary 
- Free lunch
- We have an open, pleasant and informal work atmosphere
- The latest (native) smart phone
- The opportunity to grow on a technical, personal and business level

- lot's of freedom and responsibility
- The ability to sleep in, as long as you are in the office before 10
00
- 25 days holiday allowance to have some time off too

JobCompany.JobCompanyProfile:
- We are a small, international and dedicated team working on our own app we make for our clients.
- We have an open, pleasant and informal work atmosphere.
- At the moment everyone works from home but our company is located just next to Amsterdam.
- Everyone in the team is driven and loves the job. Working independently on an assignment is therefore a requirement.
- You get a lot of freedom and responsibility working with innovative projects

Ps. we are a Dutch company, for our international colleagues we speak English.


Listen HERE to our 12 minutes company profile podcast on Spotify.
